name: Inside Jennifer
description:
As you follow the life of Jennifer, she'll bump into many different characters and end up in lots of unexpected situations. You'll have to make decisions that will make certain routes available while closing the others. The choice is yours!

In this game you play as the female protagonist Jennifer.

Inside Jennifer is an adult, corruption game, with multiple choice routes and endings. As Jennifer’s life unfolds, you’ll have to make decisions that will cause unique and distinct interactions between all characters. Stay loyal, lie, cheat or go wild, the choice is yours. Content:
  • 13.500+ IMAGES
  • 500+ ANIMATIONS
Gameplay:
  • Full Voice over for Jennifer
  • Change Angles on Images
  • Nude Mode
  • Multiple endings
  • And much more...


This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages or may not be appropriate for viewing at work.
